[INST] The novel 'The Inheritance of Loss', which won the Man Booker Prize, was written by which Indian author? [/INST]

The author who won the Man Booker Prize for his exceptional work in Literature is Kiran Desai, an author well-known for his unique writing style, which combines traditional Indian culture and philosophy with the harsh realities of life in the modern world. everybody, including the critics, raved about his novel 'The Inheritance of Loss', which offered unique insights into the human condition and the struggle of identity, and went on to win the prestigious Man Booker Prize. Kiran Desai, an author who has often been compared to his illustrious father, is certainly one of the most important literary figures to emerge from India in recent times. Kiran Desai
